alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 3:00AM CDT until July 11 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Grady County in central Oklahoma... East central Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... Western McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 300 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Union City to 3 miles south of Minco to near Lake Chickasha, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Oklahoma City, Norman, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, El Reno, Chickasha, Newcastle, Blanchard, Purcell, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Choctaw, Warr Acres, Noble, Tuttle, Slaughterville, Lexington, and Goldsby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Caddo; Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain; Oklahoma
